arn.description: The Amazon Resource Name of this instance profile.

description.description: The description of the instance profile.

excludeAppPackagesFromCleanups.description: An array of strings that specifies the list of app packages that should not be cleaned up from the device after a test run.

name.description: The name for the instance profile.

packageCleanup.description: When set to `true`, Device Farm removes app packages after a test run. The default value is `false` for private devices.

rebootAfterUse.description: When set to `true`, Device Farm reboots the instance after a test run. The default value is `true`.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the resource. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.
